name: aragorn2bsml
description: Creates a bsml document from aragorn raw output

options.description: [REQUIRED] Raw output generated by aragorn using the -w option
[REQUIRED] Id repository for use by Ergatis::IdGenerator.pm
[REQUIRED] The input file that was used as input for the glimmer3 run
[OPTIONAL] The output file will be compressed for any non-zero value (gzip)
[OPTIONAL] Project name (used in id generation). Can also use the token 'parse'. aragorn2bsml.pl will then try to parse the project from the input file. DEFAULT = 'parse'
